value.title: Amazon Web Services In Deal With National Hockey League
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services or AWS, an Amazon.com, Inc. company, has inked a deal with the National Hockey League (NHL) to become the Official Cloud, Artificial Intelligence, and Machine Learning Infrastructure Provider of the professional ice hockey league.

value.title: AWS and Bundesliga Enhance Real-Time Game Analysis with New Performance Stats for 2021 Season
